Interface VirtualServerProvider

All Superinterfaces:
Remote
All Known Implementing Classes:
NetworkServer
public interface VirtualServerProvider extends Remote
Represents an object capable of providing a VirtualServer implementation.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    VirtualServer
    accept(RMIClientConnection client)
    Requests a VirtualServer instance to the RMIClientConnection requesting it.

  • Method Details

    • accept

      VirtualServer accept(RMIClientConnection client) throws RemoteException
      Requests a VirtualServer instance to the RMIClientConnection requesting it.
      Parameters:
      client - RMIClientConnection RMI Stub of the client requesting the VirtualServer reference.
      Returns:
      VirtualServer An instance of the VirtualServer interface of the underlying MainServerController, or null if the connection is refused.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If the underlying RMI TCP channel is disrupted in any unrecoverable way.
